img_text: You Are Cordially invited to Lay BEER SUNDAY At TURTLE ROCK (Beaver Rd Extension) Sunday Sept 2 2018 Starting at 2:00 Eating Hamburgs and Hot Doggies with plenty A BEER They be boat ride'in, skeet shoot'in, fish'in But MOSTIY drink'in. So bring yur hollow leg! HOPE TO SEE YA THERE!! Rain Date- There Ain't One
